cast.name: Ringgo Agus Rahman Ringgo Agus Rahman
桑德琳娜·米歇尔 Sandrinna Michelle

introduction: Cooking Camp is opened again. Bima, Alfa, Kevin, Niki, Mely, and Key who come to the camp with the intention of reunion is surprised that the camp was closed. It all started with Evan, a well-known former Chef, who doubted Grant's credibility as a teacher at the camp. 77mi.cc And the landowner's family wants to sell camp's land. Grant, who is devastated, then entertained by the children to open the Cooking Camp again. They have the idea of selling food in a food truck so they can raise capital. Their efforts are assisted by Adel and Adit. Conflicts arising when selling food are not as easy as they think. Plus the sandwich made by Adit is accused of tracing the restaurant managed by Evan which turns out to be the first batch of Cooking Camp alumnus.
